summary: Trieste is a city and seaport in northeastern Italy, capital of the Friuli-Venezia Giulia region. Located by the Gulf of Trieste near Slovenia and Croatia, it was part of the Habsburg monarchy until 1918. Once the fourth largest city in the Austro-Hungarian Empire, Trieste was a significant trading hub and cultural center. Today, it's a major research location, known for its diverse culture and high number of researchers. With its deep-water port, Trieste serves as a maritime gateway for central Europe.
title: Trieste
